name: The Fishercat
summary: Catch fish if you can! Play as a cat who takes to the seas for one purpose: to dive into the waters and harpoon as many fish as possible while oxygen lasts. Earn coins and mechanical parts to upgrade your air tank, harpoons and boat to access new regions and bag more and more expensive fish. Now includes an aquarium mode and dreamscape levels where you can ride your air tank among the fish while catching them.
